MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the DG8 postcode area of Newton Stewart, affecting properties in Garlieston and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 11.31AM. Repairs are taking longer than expected due to the adverse weather conditions in the area and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4.00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was recorded at 12.28PM on 31 October 2020.
